item.title: CloudTalk for Mobile - Calling software for scaling sales and support teams

item.title: OpenScout by Landscape - Scout for multiple VCs, earn up to $50k for referrals
item.description: With OpenScout, investors can access diverse dealflow from handpicked scouts. Venture scouts can share deals with an entire marketplace of investors, and get paid a success fee ($5k-50k!). Apply to join as a scout or as an investor for our invite-only beta!

item.title: Fathom - Never take notes on a Zoom call again
item.description: Fathom records, transcribes, and replaces note taking with a click of a button on your Zoom calls, so you can simply focus on the conversation at hand. Easily share call highlights with your team via email, Slack, or auto-generated summaries sent to your CRM.
item.content:encoded: Fathom records, transcribes, and replaces note taking with a click of a button on your Zoom calls, so you can simply focus on the conversation at hand. Easily share call highlights with your team via email, Slack, or auto-generated summaries sent to your CRM.
